mapper.update: update guestbook set secret=#{value} where guest_num=#{guest_num}
update guestbook set content=#{content},secret=#{secret} where guest_num=#{guest_num}
mapper.select: select a.name,b.guest_com_num,b.id,b.guest_num,b.content,date_format(b.regdate,'%Y/%c/%e') as regdate,c.hompy_num from member as a join guestbook_com as b on a.id=b.id join hompy as c on c.id=a.id order by b.guest_num desc
select coalesce(count(guest_num),0) from guestbook where hompy_num=#{value}

select * from hompy where id=#{id} and hompy_num=#{hompy_num}
